extDescription.message: Automatically detects duplicate tabs and switches to the existing tab instead of opening a new one.

dupesLabel_one.description: Label below the gauge for 1 duplicate prevented (English).

dupesLabel_other.description: Label below the gauge for 0 or multiple duplicates prevented (English).

totalTabsLabel.description: Label showing the total number of opened tabs.

pause.description: Button label to pause duplicate tab detection.

resume.description: Button label to resume duplicate tab detection.

paused.description: Status message when extension is paused.
